entry.title: [FF] Recently for the first time, I tried alcohol. The high was really pleasurable an
entry.content: Recently for the first time, I tried alcohol. The high was really pleasurable and I felt extremely guilty about the hedonistic behaviour. It's only for this reason that I was hesitant about trying an inebriating substance, afraid that I might get addicted. But, any suggestions for fun activity/activities while being high, preferably something eye opening? I usually just listen to tool and other metal songs on shuffle and go into a peaceful zone.
